text: She couldn't remember what they had been talking about or which 'lark' she would warning, and with it was coupled a disembodied fragment of information, which now took on an ominous significance: Nigel had been seen in Farlingham on an occasion he had sworn he had been standing in for Luke Parsons at his surgery in Little Phelpham.
handwritten_text: She couldn't remember what they had been talking about or which 'lark' she would warning, and with it was coupled a disembodied fragment of information, which now took on an ominous significance: Nigel had been seen in Farlingham on an occasion he had sworn he had been standing in for Luke Parsons at his surgery in Little Phelpham.
